## FlyoutButtonNavigationPolicy.getFirstChild() method

Returns null since flyout buttons have no children.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getFirstChild(_current: FlyoutButton): IFocusableNode | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_current | [FlyoutButton](./blockly.flyoutbutton_class.md) | The FlyoutButton instance to navigate from. |

**Returns:**

[IFocusableNode](./blockly.ifocusablenode_interface.md) \| null

Null.
